ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 29th day of May, 1998, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the Order of the Superior Court is REVERSED, and the matter is REMANDED to the Court of Common Pleas of Montgomery County consistent with this Court’s opinion in Jacobs v. Halloran, 551 Pa. 350, 710 A.2d 1098 (1998), Marino v. Hackman, 551 Pa. 369, 710 A.2d 1108 (1998) and Shope v. Eagle, 551 Pa. 360, 710 A.2d 1104 (1998).
